snippet: Richard L. Berke, who became the executive editor less than a year ago, cited a disagreement with Politico’s founders as the reason for his resignation.
abstract: Richard L Berke, executive editor of Politico, resigns from his position, citing disagreement over strategy with organization's founders.
lead_paragraph: Richard L. Berke, who became the executive editor less than a year ago, cited a disagreement with Politico’s founders as the reason for his resignation.

headline.main: Politico Top Editor Quits Over Strategic Differences With Founders
